H0.text: Marsupial development is the development that is less risky for the mother.

H1.text: Gastrointestinal development is less risky for the mother.

H2.text: Atypical is the development that is less risky for the mother.

H3.text: Mutation is the development that is less risky for the mother.

A4.text: Early birth puts the newborn at greater environmental risk, it significantly reduces the dangers associated with long pregnancies, as the fetus cannot compromise the mother in bad seasons.
